article.author: HRH king Epete Xi, Godwill Andy Toboro

favourite.article: No matter my strength, wealth, power, wisdom, understanding knowledge etc that I sum to perfect my struggle without putting the only friend Jesus Christ, it is a fruitless struggle. He is the only one to guide that the struggle will be come fruitful.
No matter how i'm feeling right now, or what it looks like, He will never let me down. He is my best friend forever!
Indeed there's not a friend like my Jesus.
Yes men may fail us and often do but Praise God He never fails, He is the friend that sticketh closer than a brother.
Wonderfully digested and comforter
Oh how excellent this friend is. He never sleeps nor slumbers. Praise God for Jesus.
Am feeling down and this song came to me. There is not a friend like a lowly Jesus, no not one, that's the best friend we could ever have.
I love this song, because Jesus is my only friend.
Thank for this hymn in English, I like, can I know the title in French and all this in French?
None else could heal all our souls' diseases, and make us holy, pure, clean and spotless unless THEE the MASTER (JESUS).
I like most verse 3...there's not an hour that He is not near us. That's my Lord Jesus.
JESUS! There's no one like Him. No, not one! No, not one! He WILL GUIDE till the day is done.
There really cannot be a greater experience than the awesomeness of Christ the Saviour.
Nothing and no one compares to Master Jesus!
Excellent hymn playing! I love it! Thank you.
Still Waiting Till the day He will come back to Rapture the saints.
Jesus is the very breath I breath, He is my life. My understanding friend and companion on every journey.
Thank You God for Jesusâ˜º
He alone shall be my friend in my life sojourn.
He alone knows all about my struggles, there is not an hour that he's not near me, i shall testify in the year 2016 in Jesus name.
Jesus knows all my struggles. I care less about what may be happening at the moment because I know He knows all.
Indeed there's none like You, the only friend who will stick by your side through thick and thin.
God is in this song/hymn and may the Almighty God reward the writer.
Body, soul, and spirit lifting, any time, any day.
Whenever my heart is heavy, once I sing this song, I will be filled with joy. It's more a blood tonic.
This song gives me spiritual upliftment. l love it.
Jesus is the sweetest name I know. He is the only true friend, He is always there for me.
A friend like no other indeed; the truest and most exemplary one. I've always love this beautiful song since my childhood, so simple, yet very comforting & invigorating!
I am safe with a Friend like that. O yes!!!!!! I will walk all my life with Him, the lowly JESUS...
I like it too much.
Thereâ€™s not an hour that He is not near us; Knows about all our struggles! Don't we have them?
I woke up with this song on 20th March 2015, then, it wouldn't go off my mind. Jesus only is our message!

This hymn was our service hymn in our local church Assemblies of God Church Pedro today (8 Feb. 2015). It's a hymn for everyone that trusts not in their own strength or power but in the Lord our God. It has the power to activate inner strength when you mediate as you suck on every single verse and the chorus.
This is another great hymn that we sing in my church.
This song is full of strength that empowers a fainting soul so and redirect him or her that Jesus is ever with us no matter what we are going through and encourage our faith towards God.
Jesus! Much more than summation of all my friends, company, family, acquaintance and even the whole world. No better lyrics for my situationâ€”there's not a friend; yea no, not one.
I woke up with this song in my Spirit so strong for 2 Days I ðŸ’œ Love it!!!ðŸ™ŒðŸ™ŒðŸ™Œ

This song always gives me strength whenever I am weak. It reminds me always that whatever comes my way, Jesus is always with me to guide me, to deliver me, to encourage me, to strengthens me, etc. Truely there's none like Jesus.

This was one of my late mother's many favourites. What a comfort is gained when going through trials. I have been singing this song all day as there is no greater friend than the lowly Jesus who knows all our struggles and only He can and WILL take us through till the day is done.

My great grand mother would sit at her corner seat at our church of Christ and pour her heart into this song. We would sing hymns of praise. Receive a good word, good fellowship, good food, good people. My great grand mother didn't win any singing contests. (God rest her) But she loved this song. ......Those were the days.

I sang this song with passion as I walked down from First Baptist Church Ndu. Though pentacostal today, I felt realy nostalgic having worshiped for the first time in the temple where my parents wedded in 1944. This nostalgia drove me down the memory lane. I owe much to Georges & Johnson, the ones the Lord inspired to write this song.

Really there is never a friend like Jesus and there will never be one. Thank You Jesus for being a true Friend to me and my household.
Really there is not a Friend like our beautiful Jesus, and there will never be even one, NO NO NO.
I love this song and it's been my light and my strength. And will be forever. To God be the glory!
Can anyone tell me why this refers to Jesus as "lowly"?
Yes He is our dependable God, No one like Him!
He is a dependable companion. Never lose Him.
Any time I hear or sing this song, it brings to my consciousness that I am not journeying alone.
Whatever the world has taken from you Jesus will give you more. He will never leave you.
He is a friend that never condemn, He is always there when l need Him. He talks to me, He strengthens me when I am weak, I wonder what would have become of me without Jesus as a friend.
Jesus thank You, any time this hymn is rendered is as if I am seeing Jesus physically getting involved in my struggles.
For me there is indeed no friend like the lowly Jesus. This is a reassurance for me that Jesus is mindful of Me. Thank You Jesus!
This hymn encourages me too much. We have a similar hymns in Arabic in Egypt where I was before.
This song gave me encouragement to go through a very tight situation. I bless God for the composer.
Of truth 'There is not a friend like lowly Jesus. No not one! No not one'
Thank God for giving us Jesus.
One Man for all men - JESUS
I thank God for the inspiration of this hymn, I thank God for re-assuring me that am not alone in any situation I may find myself.
You may not understand the other side of this song if you've not be betrayed by someone close to you. Through it all, I'm eternally grateful that I've a friend in Jesus.

With the hymn an assurance of no great measure is given out unto mankind that He would not leave nor forsake you at anytime a very present help time of trouble. Cast your burden upon Jesus, surely He will see you through. No other friend like Jesus....our shield and buckler.
I shed tears just whispering this hymn alone. And I can't just hide how much I love You Lord, even in times of pains it brings me joy.
What an inspiring song. I shed tears every morning during family devotion because of this hymn. God bless the composer for me.
With this hymn, I am reassured that I am not alone and that I have a friend that loves me more than I love myself. Thank You Jesus.
There is not a friend like Jesus. I've tried Him and I know He will always be there. This song just let you know that Jesus is aware of all we go through; is there to guide.

I am greatly indebted to the composer of this beautiful song. It inspires me a lot, and I am grateful to God for given me such a lowly friend like Jesus. Absolutely, there can be none like Him. Peace be with you all!

I fell in love with this hymn when I was just a little girl. My grandmother sang it almost every single day. When I hear this all I can think of her singing it in her sweet soft voice wishing she was here on earth again. I'm going through so much right now and just ready to give up on life. I cry every single day. But I can't give up because I believe God and hearing this song assures me whatever it is that I am going through God knows it n He will guide me. There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no not one. I don't deserve You but I thank You for dying on the cross for all of us. Thank You so much in Jesus name I pray amen.
Lowly Jesus always there to reassure His own of His holistic healing. Thank You Jesus for the inspiration You gave to the author of this soul-inspiring hymn.

He is God's Amazing Graceâ€”the Lowly Jesus.
God's Amazing Grace- The Lowly Jesus John 8:1-11 The Lord of glory stooped low to enter our world and lives to save us. He who knew no sin became sin for us so that we might become the righteousness of God in Him. Praise the name of the Lord Jesus forever. Amen!
Surely, there is no friend like Jesus. This song is inspiring. It takes one to a higher level. Be blessed as you sing.
I bless the Lord almighty for this song. Really, there is no friend like the lowly Jesus.

Through the ridges and furrows of life, Jesus knows the sunrise and sunset of our existence, He cares so much about what I'm going through, He loves us to the depth of His Heart, with His blood on the cross of Calvary, I know I don't worth His Acceptance but He chose to LOVE, not because of what I have done but because of who He Is. Thank You Jesus!

This is so reassuring. There is indeed no friend like Jesus. Through thick and thin, He is always there for me and looking out for me. I know I don't deserve Him but I am so glad I have Him as a friend.

No matter what we are passing through in this world, which our temporary home make us remember that Jesus loves us, this is a kind of hymn that reminds us of God's Love for us through is son Jesus Christ.
Friend that never disappoint, He is always there for me. Take all your challenges to Him, He will give you joy and laughter rather.
For sure He is so wonderful we can't do without Him. thank You Lord.
Jesus really knows!
Truly Jesus is the only One you can ever have. Do you have Jesus? He is best Friend ever.
Jesus is the only Friend that I know. What a reminder!
The words of this songs reminds me that despite all what is going on around us we can depend on Jesus. Thank God for giving us this precious gift
How blessed is it for one to know that Jesus is the best friend!
Thank God I'm very happy to receive this beautiful song and I believe that Jesus is always in me in my heart.
Yes there's no Friend like JESUS.
Still HE (JESUS CHRIST) is the SUPERLATIVE friend. Thank You GOD, for giving us such a gift. AMEN.
All Glory and Honor to our Lord and Savior. Hallelujah. This song is so true. It in His Word and will keep the believers til He comes again.
This song is highly emotional. I love it beyond measure. Each time I hear it sang in the church I feel the presence of GOD and you see a lot of people crying.
I write to say thanks because my favorite song was played in my ear for the entire workday for the very first time. Oh I am so blessed and grateful.
This is a very beautiful song to cheer everyone up and give an encouragement.
I really love this song. It tells me that my Jesus is the best Friend one could ever have so I urge everyone to accept my Jesus as their God. God bless you all.
Jesus is truly my best Friend. I love Him so much. This song truly depicts my heart for my Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. No other friend like Him; you can count on Him!

There is truely no friend like JESUS, the Friend that despised the shame and the cross and died for us that we may live. What a great Friend Thou art oh sweet Jesus! You are more than this world to me.
JESUS, the reason for the season is Truly the ONLY FRIEND! The song is highly inspiring and divinely-guided lyrics!
What an inspiring song. This song reminds me daily that I have a Friend who will never forsake me and who loves me more than I love myself. I love You Jesus.
This hymn is so inspiring, encouraging and prophetic. At a time I was going through some challenges, the Good Lord used this hymn to minister to me. I have testimonies.

In the year 2000, I was lying in a coma, and tried to move my left leg, and saw a spirit of a demon standing before me screaming in a very loud voice, YOU'RE GONNA DIE! I didn't know I was in a hospital, or on my way out of a coma that I had been in for 2 months. I accepted it, because I was so afraid. Just when I thought there was no hope, as God be my witness, I heard a very soft voice whisper: Jesus, and since I couldn't talk because of the trek in my neck, I screamed: JESUS!!! in my mind and immediately came out of the coma.
The song is inspiring, it lifts my soul whenever I sing or listen to it.

This is my song of encouragement. Whenever I am passing through the trials of faith and the test of time, I alway sang the song in tears encouraging myself that Jesus knows all am passing through, and because He knows He will guide me till I come out of it all victoriously. I also use the song as a tool for evangelism. The wordings of the song is so touching, it touches the heart, spirit and soul. Any time, any day I sang it , I sang it in tears.
So loaded with comfort. Thereis not a friend like the lowly Jesus.

My family had gone through many challenges, after the death of my father my grand parents took everything belonged to us! they sold everything including our cars and houses, this song is my testmony because Jesus has been on our side since 1990, when I was just a year old. I thank God for His daily loving and caring. God loves!!
No one loved me when I was all alone and unlovable but the lowly Jesus.There is not a friend like Him.

I just want to cry for joy each time I read the lyrics of this song or listen to it. It's so so reassuring. It helps me rise above difficult situations and brightens up even in my darkest days. Thank God for the blessed assurance that He's always there for us.
There's most definitely no other friend like Jesus. This hymn is simple and to the point. I love the words they always speak to me, and just as I am a sinner find peace and solace in Him. I love Him.

This song is one which quickly links me to God when I am hurting, troubled and when things seem not to work out. It gives me hope without measure, and confidence to fae all situations. Very inspiring. Blessings to all who listen.
This is a memorable song in the days of my life. It gave me strength during my military training when days were longer than usual.

Whenever I am low; this song elevates me, strengthens me, guides me, and brings me nearer to Jesus. It also helps me find inner peace; the peace I can not find in men, all because I know I have friend in Jesus.

I like this song because when I face many difficulties or any challenge, God used to give me this song in my dreams just to tell me that there's not a friend like the lowly Jesus. It comforts and gives me courage to seek Jesus again.
The song takes me into the place of God for intecession whenever it is raised, especially when I see the pangs, challenges and the pains of mankind.

God ministered to me through this song when my brother was taken hosted by kidnappers as they are now known in Nigeria. True to His Word and the Glory of His name, my brother has been miraculously released.

It is less than 24 hours I bought the CD and listening to it more than 20 times this night, it has bless ME a lot. YES!!! NO NOT ONE like JESUS!! I will use the message in the song to preach. MAY GOOD BLESS US ALL. AMEN.
It speaks to my soul. There is no one who will ever get to know my sorrows; only Jesus does.
This song so embodies the personal relationship we must all develop with the Lord while allowing us the comfort of knowing He is omnipresent. It really speaks to the heart!!
My grandma loved this song and it was sung at her funeral.
